## Linear Mixed-Effects Models

The tutorial for Linear Mixed Effect models can be accessed with the following code. 

```{r, eval=FALSE}
access_tutorial("lme_model")
```

The tutorial provides a brief introduction to the Theory of LME models and how to create those models in R using the `lme4` package.
